roleset.name: be ill

example.name: simple object
example.text: The ailing company, which has reported net losses for 16 consecutive quarters, said it won't manufacture network computer systems any more and will greatly reduce its costly direct sales force.

example.name: complex object
example.text: A group of Michigan investors has offered to buy Knight-Ridder Inc.'s ailing Detroit Free Press for $68 million but has left unclear how the offer will be financed.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: The surprise resignations of two top economic government officials heaped more uncertainty on London 's financial markets , which already have been laboring under worries about Britain 's ailing economy .

example.name: both args
example.text: Peter Zezel died on Tuesday from a blood disorder that-1 *trace*-1 had ailed him for years.

example.name: patient as subject
example.text: Looper's shoulder ailed him all season.

roleset.note: AIL-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls pain-40.8.1. (from ail.01-v)
possibly restricted to the phrase 'what ails you'. (from ail.01-v)
